oai_dc:dc.dc:title: WDVV Equations
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Magri, Franco
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematical Physics
Nonlinear Sciences - Exactly Solvable and Integrable Systems
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The paper aims to point out a novel geometric characterisation of the WDVV equations of 2D topological field theory.
